body.name: Dash Cam, Veement 2.5k 1440P WiFi Dashcams, Dash Camera for Cars with APP, Mini Car Camera, Free 32GB SD Card, Night Vision, 24H Parking Mode, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, MAX 256GB Support
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 2 hrs 25 mins
features: 🚘 【Capture Every Detail in Stunning 2.5K Resolution】Experience the V100 dash cam cutting-edge technology, featuring an advanced starvis sensor and a 6-glass lens. It records your entire journey in ultra-clear 2560*1440P resolution, delivering 70% more pixels than standard 1080P. Say goodbye to blind spots with its wide 160° front angle, covering four lanes effortlessly. Plus, with F1.8 large aperture and super night vision car camera ensure crystal-clear footage, even in the darkest conditions.

📱 【Seamless 2.4G WiFi-APP Control】 Take control with ease using the dash camera intuitive app, available for both iOS and Android smartphones. Get real-time live streaming, conveniently preview and download videos, make quick setting adjustments, and share memorable moments with family and friends on social platforms. The perfect dashcam for cars, trucks, and SUVs, it's your reliable companion for insurance claims.

🛡️ 【Safety & Compact Design】 Safety comes first. Our V100 dash cam boasts a heat-resistant chipset and a rugged aluminum alloy shell, ensuring longevity and stable performance. Dash camera for cars built to withstand extreme weather conditions ranging from -40°F to 185°F. Its mini and discreet design won't obstruct your view while driving. Plus, there's no built-in lithium battery, eliminating the risk of overheating or collision hazards, maximizing safety for you and your vehicle.

🔄 【Effortless Loop Recording & Intelligent G-Sensor】 Never worry about running out of storage space for the dash cams. Our loop recording feature automatically overwrites the oldest unlocked file when the memory card is full. With the G-Sensor, the front dash cam detects sudden vibrations or shocks and locks the video, preventing it from being overwritten. Real-time storage TS stream technology and an RC circuit ensure faster storage speeds, safeguarding your footage from damage or loss.

🅿️ 【24/7 Parking Surveillance & Time Lapse】 For 24/7 peace of mind, consider V100 dashcams Hardwire Kit (ASIN: B0BZV58J37, NOT Included). This WiFi dash cam seamlessly switches to parking mode when your car is parked, keeping your vehicle under constant surveillance. The 24H Time Lapse mode offers continuous recording with minimal power consumption and a low frame rate, protecting your vehicle from theft or vandalism.

📷 【Free 32GB SD Card & Expandable to 256GB】The V100 mini dash camera comes with a pre-installed 32GB SD card and supports up to 256GB memory. For optimal performance, use a reputable U1 or Above SD card.
body.description: Simplify Your Drive with Veement Dash Cam Enhance Safety with Smarter Driving V100 Dash Cam: No built-in lithium battery for added stability and safety; does not support charging. Veerment Dash Camera: Comes with a complimentary 32GB SD card. If you need to replace the SD card, we recommend using a reputable class 10, U3 micro SD card. When inserting a new memory card for the first time, please format it using the provided app. Before installing and using this dashcam, be sure to thoroughly review the Quick Guide and User Manual for proper instructions 2.5K 1440P@30fps (Front Only) Super Night Vision 24H Parking Monitor(Additional Hardwire Kit Needed) Built‒in WiFi and APP Control G-Sensor + Loop Recording; Voice Alert Free 32GB SD Card; Compact Mini Design More Stable Type-C Port

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compact Dash Cam for cars Confidently Hit the Road Veement a brand renowned for crafting top-tier dash cams and consumer electronics, traces its journey back to a fervor for innovation and a relentless commitment to crafting nothing but the finest. Our story is rooted in the collaboration of engineers united by a shared vision – to pioneer groundbreaking technology that transforms driving into a safer and more enjoyable experience for all. Simplify Your Drive with Veement Dash Cam Enhance Safety with Smarter Driving V100 Dash Cam: No built-in lithium battery for added stability and safety; does not support charging. Veerment Dash Camera: Comes with a complimentary 32GB SD card. If you need to replace the SD card, we recommend using a reputable class 10, U3 micro SD card. When inserting a new memory card for the first time, please format it using the provided app. Before installing and using this dashcam, be sure to thoroughly review the Quick Guide and User Manual for proper instructions 2.5K 1440P@30fps (Front Only) Super Night Vision 24H Parking Monitor(Additional Hardwire Kit Needed) Built‒in WiFi and APP Control G-Sensor + Loop Recording; Voice Alert Free 32GB SD Card; Compact Mini Design More Stable Type-C Port

Exceptional Night Vision With its advanced Starvis Sensor, this dash camera captures crisp 1440P videos with heightened detail even in low light conditions. Trust it to be your unwavering guardian, safeguarding your car day and night. Emergency Recordings Our driving recorder features automatic emergency recording powered by a built-in G-Sensor. When it detects a sudden collision during your drive, it instantly records and locks the video, ensuring critical moments are captured. Expansive Field of Vision Our car camera boasts a wide 160° angle to eliminate blind spots and capture intricate road details. The front camera begins recording as soon as your car starts, ensuring all-around, real-time protection for your vehicle.

Clear Voice Notifications Our voice broadcast system keeps you informed about the current status of the dash camera. The built-in speaker delivers voice notifications, ensuring you're always in the know about the camera's operations. For instance, it alerts you when an impact reaches the preset G-sensor threshold, prompting the camera to lock and save the recording in the Emergency Locked Folder. Seamless Loop Recording Our loop recording feature ensures that the dash cam automatically overwrites the oldest videos once the SD card reaches full capacity, enabling continuous recording. You can customize the video file length to 1, 2, or 3 minutes through the settings. Complimentary 32GB SD Card The Veerment dash camera includes a complimentary 32GB SD card, so you can start recording as soon as you receive it. Additionally, the wireless dash cam supports memory expansion up to 256GB, making it ideal for extended journeys and longer surveillance periods. By employing H.265 coding technology, it conserves 50% of storage space while maintaining impeccable image quality and frame rates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a wifi device not bluetooth
reviews.reviewText: It messes with the phone operation however for the price it's worth it if your not on your phone's bluetooth the entire trip . It's annoying but I'm probably not returning it . Because the cost to replace it is alot compared to what I spent. And once I unplug it every thing is back to normal. So if you can deal the price is right. The video is good but upgrade the memory card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Veement 2.5k WiFi Dashcam is a game-changer! With outstanding video quality, convenient WiFi connectivity, 24H parking mode, and ample storage support, it's a must-have for every car owner. Highly recommended!
